mapper.select: select funding_no from like_record where member_no = #{memberNo} and status='Y' order by no desc

select f.*, (select name from member where member_no = f.writer_no)name from funding f
where f.writer_no = 21 and f.status = 'Y'

select f.*, (select name from member where member_no = f.writer_no)name from funding f
where f.writer_no = 21 and f.status = 'N'
mapper.update: update funding set rate_plan_code = '${charge}' where funding_no = ${no}
update funding set category_code = '${categoryCode}', title = '${title}', goal_amount = ${goalAmount}, reg_date = default, d_day = ${dDay} where funding_no = ${fundingNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into attachment( no, funding_no, original_filename, renamed_filename ) values( seq_attachment_no.nextval, ${fundingNo}, ${originalFilename}, ${renamedFilename}
)
mapper.update: update funding set status = 'Y' where funding_no = ${fundingNo}
mapper.select: select rownum, f.* from ( select funding.* , CASE category_code WHEN 'C1' THEN '테크·가전' WHEN 'C2' THEN '푸드' WHEN 'C3' THEN '여행' WHEN 'C4' THEN '스포츠' WHEN 'C5' THEN '게임·취미' WHEN 'C6' THEN '모임' WHEN 'C7' THEN '반려동물' WHEN 'C8' THEN '기부.후원' END as categoryName from funding where start_date < sysdate and d_day > sysdate order by reg_date desc ) f where rownum between 1 and 6
select rownum, f.* from ( select * from funding where start_date < sysdate and d_day > sysdate order by like_count desc ) f where rownum between 1 and 5
select count(*) from funding where start_date> sysdate

select * from funding f
title like '%' || '${searchKeyword}' || '%'
and category_code like '%' || '${category}' || '%'
and d_day > sysdate
and d_day < sysdate
order by reg_date desc
order by like_count desc

select * from funding F join funding_reward R on F.funding_no = R.funding_no join attachment A on F.funding_no = A.funding_no join member M on F.writer_no = M.member_no where F.funding_no = #{funding_no}
